Uses of Package
com.sensoro.beacon.kit

  • Classes in com.sensoro.beacon.kit used by com.sensoro.beacon.kit 
    Class and Description
    BaseSettings
    The beacon setting class,this class can set or get transmit power, advertising interval of the beacon.It also can control energy saving mode, password status.
    BaseSettings.AdvertisingInterval
    The advertising interval enum of the beacon.
    BaseSettings.EnergySavingMode
    The energy saving mode enum of the beacon.
    BaseSettings.TransmitPower
    The transmit power enum of the beacon.
    Beacon
    The class of the beacon.The class can show all informantion of the beacon.
    Beacon.Proximity
    The proximity enum of the beacon.
    SensoroBeaconConnection.BeaconConnectionCallback
    The callback interface of the beacon.
    SensoroBeaconConnection.SecureBroadcastInterval
    The secure broadcast interval.
    SensoroBeaconConnection.SensoroException
    The exception of the SDK.
    SensoroBeaconManager
    This class can manage the sensoro beacon service.The class uses the singleton mode.If you want to get the instance of the class,use SensoroBeaconManager.getInstance(Context)
    SensoroBeaconManager.BeaconManagerListener
    The callback interface when beacons appear, disappear, update.
    SensorSettings
    The class for setting the beacon sensors.
    SensorSettings.AccelerometerSensitivity
    The enum of the acceleration sensor sensitivity.
